name: Air purifier

name: Mattress
description: We are assisting a family living in a 3-room flat with a special needs child. Their current mattresses are old and worn, making it difficult for the children to get proper rest. We are seeking 4 single mattresses to provide the children with a comfortable and supportive place to sleep, which will greatly improve their sleep quality and overall wellbeing. These items will make a meaningful difference in supporting the family’s daily needs and the children’s health. We are looking at possibly getting 4 mattresses for our client, at donor’s discretion.

passiton.name: Tempur Cloud Mattress Queen Size
passiton.description: Bought this mattress new around 8years ago. Still in good condition. Will include a mattress protector. I decided to get a replacement as I wanted something firmer for my back.

name: Tablet
description:
Mr Hong, age 90, widowed lives with his nephew who is mute, deaf and intellectually disabled. 

Nephew does not work and stays at home most of the time. while he has been to a special needs school during his teenage years, he is not able to be meaningfully employed in the later years

a tablet would enable him to learn materials through videos, and for faster communication when social worker needs to reach out to him

passiton.name: Tall side Tablet
passiton.description: Is a wooden side tall side table, look brand new
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Coffee
description:
PPIS FSCW RELIGHT would like to request for 10 or more packets of halal coffee for its beneficiaries. Thank you! 

RELIGHT is an initiative by PPIS FSC (West) to actively support beneficiaries through disbursement of donated items from individuals and corporate donors. These include daily necessities and fresh produce, which is distributed every quarter of the year.

passiton.name: Glass Coffee Table
passiton.description: In excellent condition
passiton.location: Anson, Chinatown, Shenton Way, Tanjong Pagar
